episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch01:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s Poryphone
suddenly stopped working properly.

So [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] decided to consult Volkner, who
happened to be nearby at the time.
So...your Poryphone is malfunctioning?

There seems to be a bug with the calling function
and some other features, too?
Let me take a look at it.
Don’t worry. It doesn’t look too—
Actually, you know what?

Would you like to take a stab at fixing it,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?

It’s a simple repair, and I can walk you through
how it’s done. What do you think?

(Accept Volkner’s offer, and take on
the challenge.)
That’s the spirit!
It’ll be a challenge for me, too!

(Ask why he’s suggesting you tinker
with it.)
Well, y’know...

You’ve been influenced and taught by a lot of
different folks here on Pasio, right?

I guess that kind of makes me want to teach you,
too. Namely...how to tinker with machines!

This is a chance for you to learn all about how fun
tinkering can be!
OK! Let’s get right down to it!
First...

Following Volkner’s instructions,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was able to repair
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] Poryphone.
Let’s test it out—give me a call.

It worked! Just in case, let’s run a few more
performance tests...

Well done—it’s fully repaired now! You did a
great job.

It’s interesting getting to see the inner workings of
your Poryphone. Isn’t tinkering fun?
(Happily say you had fun.)
I’m so glad to hear that!

(Say you’re amazed you were able to
fix it yourself.)
Right?

I’d like you to experience even MORE of the joys
of tinkering with machines!
So...
would you like to help me with a project of mine?

A while after [Name:PlayerNickname ] began
helping Volkner...
It’s time!

We can finally show off our renovation project to
light up the stadium!

And those lights should be turning on any
second now...
Aha! There they are!

Wh-whoa! What’s up with those super
gaudy colors?!
They’re like an Alolan Muk!
I think they’re kinda fun!
Hahaha!

We did it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Our
modifications are a hit!

(Tell him you should have taken it
even further.)

Yeah, you’re not wrong about that! I’ll be a little
more adventurous next time!
(Say you’re proud of your ideas.)

Yeah, those were great! They even sparked
a fire in my heart, too!

I wanted you to see how Trainers who like to
tinker operate...

And I wanted you to get a glimpse of how fun it
is out in the field.

You’re just starting out in this DIY hobby, and
that’s when you have the most fun with it,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].

Once you’ve gotten a taste of success, there’s no
going back!

Just you wait, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...you’ll
be obsessed in no time.

VOLKNER! [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
WHAT. HAVE. YOU. DONE?!
Oops... Looks like our client isn’t very happy...
Well...
I guess we’ll just have to get scolded together!
